channel.title: RSCE Map Editor
channel.description:
Hello,
Well I've been working on RSCE's new map editor for a couple of days now we are using xEnt's 2D map editor base (Its horrible I had to rewrite loads of that shame..)
Features.. Highlight tile will send all that tile Info to the jTree Able to change your brush size from 1-48 Paint All this function will set all the tile's to a certain tile configuring you want Copy Selected Tile (No more needs to be said) Save Brush. Basically the current settings you are using for your brush you are aloud to save the brush (Name) and each time you load the RSCE map editor them brushes will be present and ready for you to work with Colour chart... Basically shows all the colours you are aloud to use as ground textures. Hold shift and it will reset that tile to what it was upon loading 3D preview 3D update.. (When the 3D preview is loaded you can update the map straight away without having to restart the 3D preview) First player view on 3D preview
There is a lot more features on this editor than I can list if yours ask Luke (Kyprtix) he will be able to list all the features [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2m3n4gp.png[/img]
3D preview Up key: Move Camera up Down Key: Moves Camera Down Left Key: Moves camera to the left Right key: Moves camera to the right
W: Moves forward D: Moves left S: Moves down A: Moves Right [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/291cneq.png[/img]

item.title: RSCE Map Editor
item.dc:creator: @Asylum Asylum
item.description:
@Asylum wrote:

[quote=“hm wtf lol xD, post:28, topic:361567”][quote author=Asylum link=topic=457838.msg3352080#msg3352080 date=1285438325]

Yes you never hired me he did, He got the stuff he asked for done in a couple of hours and more updates what they ask for I would say his got a amazing bargain and You say to to Luke I wouldn’t hire him… But to be honest you wouldn’t hire me because of my “Past” with botnets and etc but seeing as what he payed for was really the source to the editor because I would gave him this landscape editor for free if it was just the binary to it…

I gave a spec list and how much I’d pay and the goods arrived 8 hours later. There’s no one else who would do it that quickly for that little money so I’m more than happy with the purchase. That’s all that matters.

Again, I’m laughing at TX himself, not his software. You 2 killed the funny with idiocy (though I expected nothing less from both of you).

/thread now declared retarded.
[/quote]I guess your just mentally retarded who needs to be slapped? Because I seriously do not no what your problem is…[/quote]

I’m mentally retarded because you cannot figure out what I’m laughing at?

SMH.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCE Map Editor
item.dc:creator: @Asylum Asylum
item.description:
@Asylum wrote:

[quote=“hm wtf lol xD, post:21, topic:361567”]I see no point in you laughing seeming as every company free lances work to other people to build tools for them when there own development team does not have time? learn business you spend money to earn money and this will earn RSCE money in the long run because its faster to build landscapes meaning no time wasted building landscapes what takes over 2-4 hours with xEnts current one…

Edited how you put tiles down… If you tick the option next to the fields it will mean that field will not be changed so if you only wanted ground textures to be edited u tick everything else expect for that one…

Also some other stuff you will obv will see[/quote]

Asylum:

You hired TX, of all people. That alone is funny.

Asylum:

Clearly we’re talking about the person, not the software.

Asylum:

Try to keep up, and keep the walls of text at a minimum. Today is a tl;dr kind of day.

I don’t give a shit who it is… He produced the goods 8 hours after I gave him a spec list. What’s the problem? It’s not as if you’re hiring him so why do you even care?

Since when does it mean you care just because you laugh?

That’s the point; I wouldn’t hire him. It’s funny that you did.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCE Map Editor
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterofl roflcopterofl
item.description:
@roflcopterofl wrote:

[quote=“Asylum, post:20, topic:361567”][quote author=Kryptix link=topic=457838.msg3351973#msg3351973 date=1285431444]

It’s pretty self explanatory.

I don’t see how… Can you please link me to a map editor that is better than this? If not, then why is it funny to pay someone a minimal amount of money to produce you a landscape editor that will speed up landscaping 10 fold? It’s not as if I’ve personally paid him either, subscription generated funds are put back into paying developers and services that make their game play better and this certainly will…
[/quote]

You hired TX, of all people. That alone is funny.

Who said anything about the landscape editor itself? Clearly we’re talking about the person, not the software. Try to keep up, and keep the walls of text at a minimum. Today is a tl;dr kind of day.[/quote]
Agreed

Read full topic
